pr_title: Add toggle to remove spellbook tooltips

timeline.message: Add toggle to remove spellbook tooltips

timeline.bodyText: This is a really confusing method name as it is opposite the actual behavior of the method.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -52,4 +52,15 @@ default boolean chatboxTooltip()
 	{
 		return true;
 	}
+
+	@ConfigItem(
+			position = 2,
+			keyName = "spellbookTooltip",
+			name = "Disable Spellbook Tooltips",
+			description = "Disable Spellbook Tooltips so they don't cover descriptions"
+	)
+	default boolean spellbookTooltip()

replies.bodyText: Refactoring method name and committing suggested changes
replies.author: zeffirojoe

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/mousehighlight/MouseHighlightConfig.java b/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/mousehighlight/MouseHighlightConfig.java
index a651e0bf0..03148d80b 100644
--- a/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/mousehighlight/MouseHighlightConfig.java
+++ b/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/mousehighlight/MouseHighlightConfig.java

@@ -54,10 +54,10 @@ public interface MouseHighlightConfig extends Config
 	}
 
 	@ConfigItem(
-			position = 2,
-			keyName = "spellbookTooltip",
-			name = "Disable Spellbook Tooltips",
-			description = "Disable Spellbook Tooltips so they don't cover descriptions"
+		position = 2,
+		keyName = "spellbookTooltip",
+		name = "Disable Spellbook Tooltips",
+		description = "Disable Spellbook Tooltips so they don't cover descriptions"
 	)
 	default boolean spellbookTooltip()
 	{

timeline.message: Refactoring method name to reduce confusion
